collectible.title: Victory Badge
collectible.subtitle: You won a match against Ribbon Girl! Nice work!
collectible.text: Badges are all the rage amongst ARMS League fanatics. This design in particular was given out to fans who supported Ribbon Girl during her second Party Crash bout.
collectible.unlock: Win a match against Ribbon Girl.

collectible.title: Sparkies
collectible.subtitle: These gloves are electric!
collectible.text: Great for exploiting gaps in your opponent's defenses, these seem to be one of the most popular ARMS with fans and are Ribbon Girl's signature weapon. A charged punch with one of these will leave an opponent's arms disabled, making them unable to attack or block and greatly reducing their mobility.
collectible.unlock: Play a game with Ribbon Girl.
